title: How iPhone and Smart Watch Are Used by NWO to Brainwash the Masses | Alternative
text:
(Before It's News)
The Illuminati are using Apple to prepare the world to accept the coming transhumanist satanic evolution! Man is trying to become God through science and technology without the forgiveness of sins through Christ! This deception and delusion will lead many into destruction. In this video I show how apple is going to be used in the Illuminati end times agenda! God Bless
Thanks for taking your time to check out this information. Love to hear what YOU think in the comments section below!
